basics.name: Brenton Bills
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a degree qualified software developer with over 10 years experience. I've worked for both small and large organisations in Australia and internationally. I have had experience in a diverse set of industries and that has given me the skills to adapt to new fields of business and technology. I do enjoy learning new skills and challenges.

work.summary: Built a CMS for APN’s 20 daily newspapers and classifieds site. I’ve been involved in over 100 SCRUM iterations of the software. I’ve built features, ensured that the platform is performant and integrated with third party systems. We’ve built a reliable platform using Python and Django that has allowed content to be easily published online.
highlights: Building new features for the CMS in Django and Python
Ensuring the software is performant during high traffic periods
Involved in the deployment of the software on AWS
Lead a team of 6 developers

work.summary: Worked on an mobile service platform that allows the publishing of content on mobile devices in a manner that degraded it successfully based on the capabilities of the mobile device.
highlights: Developed with Ruby/Mysql new features and fixed bugs
Assisted the Quality Assurance department with Selenium testing
Learnt Ruby on the job
Worked successfully in a team of both Japanese and international staff

work.summary: Worked as an English instructor to Japanese students of all ages
highlights: Dealing with people with a wide range of abilities
Vast improvement in my communication skills

work.summary: Part of the development team that worked on various consulting projects for mainly Japanese companies in the UK and Europe
highlights: Python development with some direct customer interaction
Worked on a project for Suzuki dealers in Hungry to order vehicles parts from Suzuki MSC using Zope, Python, Postgresql
Toyota Tsusho UK, a project to integrate Toyota’s just in time ordering system with Toyota Tsusho, a tyre supplier
Takeda UK, main developer on a project for Takeda’s sales representatives, to test them on their knowledge of the companies products. Implemented with wxPython & XML

work.position: Assistant System Adminstrator / PHP and C Developer
work.summary: Worked in a two man team as an assistant system administrator as well as some development for an ISP of about 2000 users
highlights: Ensure services were running
Ensure billing processing was run correctly
Assisted in rewriting the billing system using PHP and some C

work.summary: Main Python Software developer on the Zope project taking instruction from a Business Analyst working directly with the company
highlights: Learnt the responsibility of being the only software developer on a project

work.summary: Worked remotely from Brisbane for a San Francisco, USA startup as a software developer on a project to making hiring easier
highlights: Part of a team working on Python development using the Zope platform to produce tools for the Hiringtools suite
Worked on the Job Advert Writer and the Interview plan builder
